config.script:
tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Mode'
	system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath],[1])
	tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Start Rev CMD'
	system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath],[1])

tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Mode'
	system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath],[1])
	tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Start Fwd CMD'
	system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath],[1])

tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Mode'
	system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath],[1])
	tagPath = self.view.custom.deviceTagPath + '/Stop CMD'
	system.tag.writeBlocking([tagPath],[1])
